definition: luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: You feel you have something more to live for.
sentences.chinese: 你感觉生活变得更有意义和丰富多彩。

sentences.english: Coeducation gives kids the opportunity of growing in an atmosphere of diversity.
sentences.chinese: 男女同校为孩子提供了一种丰富多彩的成长环境。

sentences.english: The abundance of linguistic culture leads to diversifications in the contents and forms of allusions.
sentences.chinese: 丰富的语言文化造就了典故语丰富多彩的内容和形式。

sentences.english: I think our life is colourful.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们的生活丰富多彩。

sentences.english: The best workers are well-rounded professionals with full lives, in and out of the office.
sentences.chinese: 最好的员工在职场内外都有丰富多彩的生活。

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of Chinese language is its colorfulness in classifiers.
sentences.chinese: 具有丰富多彩的量词是汉语的特色之一。

sentences.english: Listed with rich color and fashion color trend just beat.
sentences.chinese: 上市颜色丰富多彩与流行色潮流正好合拍。

sentences.english: Ms. Kher has enlarged them and organized them in colorful rows.
sentences.chinese: 女士Kher放大了他们，他们组织了丰富多彩的行。

sentences.english: Gray paperboard packaging made with a variety of gift packaging to the world.
sentences.chinese: 用灰板纸做出的包装能够丰富多彩的礼品包装世界。

sentences.english: The charming ethnic lifestyles and customs bring about colorful folk artistic entertainments.
sentences.chinese: 这些醉人的民族风情造就了丰富多彩的民间文艺。

sentences.english: Walking stimulates the senses and enables you to enjoy a rich engagement with life around you.
sentences.chinese: 步行让感觉更敏锐，能让你发觉周围生活的丰富多彩。

sentences.english: It is colorful and florid , is a new type of roofing material.
sentences.chinese: 这是丰富多彩的和华丽，是一种新型的屋面材料。

sentences.english: The discipline of Chinese provides a rich content for the education of psychological health.
sentences.chinese: 语文学科为心理健康教育提供了丰富多彩的内容。

sentences.english: The beauty of the old capital was a vivid and living compensation .
sentences.chinese: 故都的美对于我是一种丰富多彩，生动有趣的补偿。

sentences.english: They lead a busy and colourful life on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 他们在大学里过着忙碌而又丰富多彩的生活。

sentences.english: There's a rich conversation about the festivals in creating unity in neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 还有一场关于节日能促进社区团结的对话很丰富多彩。

definition: elegant and graceful posture/splendid, full of content
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
having a unique or distinctive style
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
brilliant and varied/(often in the combination 精彩纷呈)
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
